title: Public hearing on proposed revision to crowdfunding rules (SEC - Securities and Exchange Commission Thailand) ...
text: ( Source : SEC - Securities and Exchange Commission Thailand ) Bangkok , October 12 , 2015 -The SEC is seeking public comments on the proposed revision to the crowdfunding rules, which have been effective since May 2015. The revision aims to
